entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
